attributes.review: Okay this has taught me a valuable life lesson, and I’m trying to warn all of y’all. NEVER DOWNLOAD AN APP FROM AN UNTRUSTWORTHY SOURCE. Okay, so I thought that since our glorious president’s name was on the app it would be amazing and I could learn about more things to support his gorgeous self. BUT I WAS WRONG. This app is run by the crazy radical ANTIFA leftists who are trying to control us!!! Once I got on the app it visibly turned on my camera to watch me!!!! I wouldn’t be crazy to think it had access to my microphone and everything on my phone! Be careful on the internet!!!! Never trust any app creators. These companies are silently taking over the world! As a trump supporter full of concern for the American people, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. DONT BE A VICTIM TO THE RADICAL LEFTISTS!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: BE CAREFUL WHEN DOWNLOADING

attributes.review: i tried to download it but it just wouldn’t work and then when it finally did 6️⃣9️⃣days later my power went out ✨ my perfume bottles were literally dancing on my ceiling fan and stinking up my whole room 😭😭😭 then i heard beeping in the kitchen and i saw that the microwave had exploded🔥and that had my totinos totinos hot ♏️pizza rolls in it!!!! i look in my living room and there i see 15 wind up chicks 🐥 dancing on my couch🛋!!!! my favorite pink sparkly hat 💖👒 flew out my door and i saw on the news that it caused mass destruction. if i could give a worse review i would but thanks a lot trump for making america worse again 🤡❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤🤍🤎💖

attributes.review: So not only did this app take over an hour to download, but by the time I finally got on, the app starts glitching asking me to turn on notifications. However I had to say no because my parents are anti-trump, and my dad is voting for Kanye, and thinks that women shouldn’t be seen nor heard(that’s why I study at the Milford Academy in Orange County). After 2 minutes of declining notifications it kicked me out of the app. Then my messages kept getting spammed from Trump’s campaign, and mind you this was before I even got the chance to put it in. Sadly I can’t support Trump through the website because my dad put restrictions on Safari ever since my brother stole my phone and got caught watching three drunk albino lesbians having a threesome while wearing joe Biden, Obama and bill Clinton masks on porn hub😬
